creator: maankhamis@hotmail.com
text:
xindiceadmin does not work if the environment variable CLASSPATH has spaces.
e.g. CLASSPATH=.;c:\Xindice\java\lib\Xindice.jar;C:\Program 
Files\Altova\xmlspy\XMLSpyInterface.jar

It will work though if I quote the path.
CLASSPATH=.;c:\Xindice\java\lib\Xindice.jar;"C:\Program 
Files\Altova\xmlspy\XMLSpyInterface.jar"

Please try out 1.1 or the cvs head and reopen the bug if you have issues with 
that version.  If you solve the problem, please submit the patch in diff -u 
format.  If you can prove the bug, please attach a junit test.
creator: Kevin.Ross@iVerticalLeap.com
